violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD shall only contact surfaces of EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS that are cleaned and SANITIZED, or SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Equipment shall be washed, rinsed, and sanitized after contamination and between uses.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) FOOD TEMPERATURE MEASURING DEVICES shall be provided and readily accessible for use in ensuring attainment and maintenance of FOOD temperatures as specified under Chapter 3. (Pf)   
(B) A TEMPERATURE MEASURING DEVICE with a suitable small-diameter probe that is designed to measure the temperature of thin masses shall be provided and readily accessible to accurately measure the temperature in thin FOODS such as MEAT patties and FISH filets. (Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide smooth, beveled edge on can opener blade.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: After cleaning and SANITIZING, EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS shall be air-dried or used after adequate draining.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Completely air dry all items prior to storage/use.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: After cleaning and SANITIZING, EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS shall be air-dried or used after adequate draining.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Completely air dry all items prior to storage/use.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A sign or poster that notifies FOOD EMPLOYEES to wash their hands shall be provided at all HANDWASHING SINKS used by FOOD EMPLOYEES and shall be clearly visible to FOOD EMPLOYEES.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A toilet room used by females shall be provided with a covered receptacle for sanitary napkins.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Subway 51089
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
Except during preparation, cooking, or cooling, or when time is used as the public health control POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOOD (TIME/TEMPERATURE CONTROL FOR SAFETY FOOD) shall be maintained:
(A)  135ºF or above, except that roasts properly cooked and cooled may be held              at a temperature of 130ºF; or (P)
(B)   At 41ºF or less (P)
